job_history.work_description: Experienced technology leader with expertise in managing all aspects of front and back office systems in the Financial Services Industry. A solid leader who can utilize his diverse background of information technology and business management skills to create winning teams to support mission-critical infrastructure.

Managed technology for an institutional trading firm, specializing in Fixed Income and Equities products. Responsible for strategy, support and technology initiatives in a dynamic trading environment resulting in maximum system availability and responsive customer support.
Worked directly with vendors to implement/upgrade market data software and hardware Coordinated a successful PC hardware and operating system upgrade for all branch offices.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Held senior leadership positions, including Senior VP and Chief Information Officer, indicating expert-level mastery in leadership.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Managed technology initiatives and upgrades in a dynamic trading environment, suggesting strong proficiency in project management.

skills.name: IT Management
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in managing all aspects of front and back office systems, indicating expert-level mastery in IT management.

skills.name: System Administration
skills.explanation: Coordinated a successful PC hardware and operating system upgrade for all branch offices, suggesting strong proficiency in system administration.

skills.name: Vendor Management
skills.explanation: Worked directly with vendors to implement/upgrade market data software and hardware, showing a solid working proficiency in vendor management.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Responsible for ensuring maximum system availability and responsive customer support, suggesting strong proficiency in problem-solving.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Coordinated with teams and vendors, showing a solid working proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Computer Science
skills.explanation: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, showing a solid working proficiency in computer science concepts.
